iati-activity.description: The objectives are: Communicate the CHDR data analysis to youth with youth participation; Engage Caribbean youth to support the implementation of the CHDR; Empower youth as agents of change to promote human development.

iati-activity.description: The project aims to engage Caribbean youth to support the implementation of the CHDR recommendations. This will be done promoting youth dialogues and supporting proposals developed by youth to build youth resilience in communities.
